EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to Directive (EU) 2021/338 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 16 February 2021, the Capital Markets 
Recovery Package (CMRP). The CMRP is a package of measures that sets out 
of targeted amendments to financial services frameworks to support economic 
recovery in the aftermath of Covid-19 crisis. Amendments to Directive 
2014/65/EU, the Markets in Financial Instruments Directive (MiFID II), 
include simplifying information requirements in a targeted manner while 
safeguarding investor protection.
